00223     void setBox(const matrix &box, BoundaryCondition::eBoxtype boxtype=BoundaryCondition::typeAuto) {
00224         // determine box type automatically in case boxtype==typeAuto
00225         if(boxtype==BoundaryCondition::typeAuto) {
00226             boxtype = autoDetectBoxType(box);
00227         }
00228 
00229         if(_bc) {
00230             delete (_bc);
00231         }
00232         
00233         switch(boxtype) {
00234             case BoundaryCondition::typeTriclinic:
00235                 _bc = new TriclinicBox();
00236                 break;
00237             case BoundaryCondition::typeOrthorhombic:
00238                 _bc = new OrthorhombicBox();
00239                 break;
00240             default:
00241                 _bc = new OpenBox();
00242                 break;
00243         }
00244                
00245         _bc->setBox(box);
00246     };
00247 
00252     const matrix &getBox() {
00253         return _bc->getBox();
00254     };
00255     
00260     void setTime(double t) { _time = t; };
00261

00364 inline Bead *Topology::CreateBead(byte_t symmetry, string name, BeadType *type, int resnr, double m, double q)
00365 {
00366     
00367     Bead *b = new Bead(this, _beads.size(), type, symmetry, name, resnr, m, q);    
00368     _beads.push_back(b);
00369     return b;
00370 }
00371 
00372 inline Molecule *Topology::CreateMolecule(string name)
00373 {
00374     Molecule *mol = new Molecule(this, _molecules.size(), name);
00375     _molecules.push_back(mol);
00376     return mol;
00377 }
00378 
00379 inline Residue *Topology::CreateResidue(string name)
00380 {
00381     Residue *res = new Residue(this, _molecules.size(), name);
00382     _residues.push_back(res);
00383     return res;
00384 }
00385 
00386 inline Molecule *Topology::MoleculeByIndex(int index)
00387 {
00388     return _molecules[index];
00389 }
00390 
00391 inline void Topology::InsertExclusion(int i, list<int> l) {
00392     _exclusions.InsertExclusion(i,l);
00393 }
